FuncDef: The context to enable URL test parameters. IP filters can be used to selectively cache some web sites.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the URL test. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters in length composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
This keyword is required to create the URL test context. Once it is created, the context can be enabled with or without the create keyword.
